name: Elder Dining Chair - Cloud Wash
description: With its simple silhouette crafted from pine wood and rattan, this dining chair is a replica of a Shaker design. The Shakers could be considered early advocates of minimalism, applying similar design principles to the 20th-century design school, before the movement itself existed; their furniture was a balance between producing pieces that were sturdy enough to withstand daily use, and doing this with limited amounts of locally sourced wood.
